txt.en: Return to Darri at the Dolven-view
You have recorded an accurate description of this mirror
You have recorded an accurate description of this mirror
You have recorded an accurate description of this mirror
Darri has been wondering about the purposes of the ancient mirrors of Moria.
You have recorded an accurate description of this mirror

'Greetings, friend [placeholder]. I am Darri, and I hail from the Lonely Mountain. It is hard to believe we are truly treading the ancient paths of Khazad-d√ªm, is it not? It is enough to kindle a flame in the heart of even the stoniest dwarf.

'There is one thing in which I have a particular interest: the mirrors you may have seen about the Twenty-first Hall. I believe there are four of them, and I have a theory about what they are for.

'Could you go and record some information about the mirrors, such as rotation, location, and so forth? I would like to study what you find.'
The four mirrors can be found at the corners of the Twenty-first Hall in Zelem-melek.\n\nYou should find the mirrors and record the rotation and locations of them.
'Good work, [placeholder]! Now, let me take a look at the recordings you made.'
The dwarf Darri can be found in the Twenty-first Hall in Moria.\n\nHaving found several unbroken mirrors, you should return to Darri and report your success.
'Have you found the mirrors I sent you to seek?'
Return to Darri at the Twenty-first Hall
